issue.title: [CF 412] Timer bar bugged when offset
issue.body:
I discovered that when you offset a timer bar the bar is:

a) not offset in any direction
b) no longer shrinking, while still changing colors


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #412 | Raw

comments.body:
Could you post the export string of the icon that is doing this? It works OK with this icon, setting the offset to both 2 and -2. It also properly inherits everything when stuck into a meta icon.
